---
title: "Publishing Quarto websites with GitHub pages"
---


## Workflow to explore

1. Start with a new project on local selecting quarto website + use `usethis` to make it a repo and push it to github

1. Start by rendering locally in a `docs` folder

1. Setup github pages to look into the docs folder for the website


## Potential additional topics

1. css and stysheets

1. GitHub actions to render website


## What could be a fun website content?

- Something on the theme of love data week
- silly things with giffs
- piece of code
- Interactive data visualization
